article.title: Synergies between Exoplanet Surveys and Variable Star Research

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the field of view of the KELT-North instrument shown in the figure?
According to the figure, which of these projects is NOT a ground-based survey?
Based on the figure, which survey has discovered a higher number of planets?
choices: The figure doesn't provide this information
The light curve of a transiting exoplanet
The frequency spectrum of a pulsating star
The light curve of SN 2014J, including its pre-outburst state
The color-period diagram of a star cluster

multiple_choice_question.text: What type of object is J0902-0720, shown in the figure?
choices: A rotating star in an open cluster

multiple_choice_question.text: What information does the figure primarily convey?
choices: The relationship between stellar rotation period and color for stars in two open clusters
The evolutionary tracks of stars in open clusters
The distribution of variable star types in open clusters
The differences in metallicity between two open clusters

multiple_choice_question.text: What future project is depicted in the figure?
